N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 135.8 - Determination of necessity for restricted license

State Regulations

The determination as to the necessity for any motorist to
obtain a restricted license shall be made by the commissioner based upon
information provided by the motorist in a form provided by the commissioner. The applicant must make a positive statement of need. The commissioner may
investigate such statement or require the verification of the facts before
accepting such a statement. Notes
